title: Head of Private Equity - Fund Administration (M/F)
description:
Head of Private Equity Fund Administration (with eFront)




Reporting to the Global Head of Fund Administration, this is a strategic leadership role overseeing Private Equity and Private Debt fund administration services and leading a dedicated team.




Key Responsibilities




 * Ensure efficient daily operations and full compliance with regulatory requirements.
 * Supervise fund accounting, investor reporting, and the full fund administration process.
 * Develop and refine procedures to enhance efficiency, accuracy, and service quality.
 * Act as a key point of contact for fund managers, investors, auditors, legal/tax advisors, custodians, and other partners.
 * Monitor team performance and drive continuous improvements.
 * Stay ahead of industry best practices and implement innovations where relevant.
 * Mentor and support team members through training and development.
 * Foster collaboration across departments to ensure seamless service delivery.
 * Uphold high operational standards and strong internal controls.







Your Profile




 * Degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics or related field (or equivalent by experience).
 * Minimum 5 years’ experience in Private Equity, Private Debt, or Real Estate fund administration.
 * Proven leadership and team management capabilities.
 * Strong communication, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
 * Excellent attention to detail and commitment to meeting deadlines.
 * Fluent in English; additional European languages are a plus.
 * Familiarity with eFront is a strong advantage.
 * Work permit and required




If you meet the key requirements and are looking to take the next step in your Private Equity career, we’d be happy to hear from you.
